concept.title: JavaScript Evaluator
concept.shortdesc: The JavaScript Evaluator processes data based on JavaScript code. Use the JavaScript processor to use JavaScript code to perform custom processing.

conbody.p: JavaScript Evaluator processoroverviewprocessorsJavaScript EvaluatorThe JavaScript Evaluator can process data one record at a time or one batch at a time.
When you use a JavaScript Evaluator in a pipeline, the passes a batch of data to the processor and converts the data to a scripting-friendly data structure for processing.

The JavaScript Evaluator supports the following versions of Java:
Java 7 - Supports ECMAScript 5 and partially supports JavaScript 1.8. Runs on the Rhino 1.7R3 JavaScript engine.
Java 8u40 and above - Supports ECMAScript 5.1. Runs on the Nashorn JavaScript engine. Some Java 8 JavaScript functionality is not available in Java 7 JavaScript. To ensure the JavaScript Evaluator performs as expected, use the same version of Java in development and production.
